body.name: Catrimown Queen Platform Bed Frame with Headboard and Footboard, Queen Size Bed Frame with Mattress Foundation, Under Bed Storage, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly, Noise-Free, Brown
features: Classic Design: A queen size metal bed frame with a decorative headboard, footboard and clean lines, combined with wooden panels, brings a romantic and cozy feel to your space.

Sturdy & Durable: This queen size bed frame with headboard is constructed from a thick metal frame and sturdy engineered wood to increase its durability, and the 100% reinforced steel tube construction provides a safe and comfortable sleeping environment.
Under-bed Storage: The bed frame queen size offers generous 12 inch under bed storage so you can keep your room tidy by neatly storing toys and belongings.
Quiet Sleep: The EVA non-slip strip and non-slip feet help prevent noise, and the mattress is fixed so that the mattress does not move easily and ensures a restful night's sleep.
Easy to Assemble: All accessories are in a box, and installation tools and steps are provided, so two people can quickly assemble it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Heavy Duty Support Bed Frame Catrimown Bed Frame with Headboard and Footboard Sturdy – Heavy-duty metal slats enhance the sturdiness and durability of the platform twin bed structure. Storage Under the Bed - 12 inches of space under the bed to store more items. Easy to Assemble - each part is clearly labeled and numbered, making assembly quick and easy.
SPARKLE POINT Modern Style The black bed frame features a rustic, sleek silhouette. Sturdy Structure Square heavy-duty frame provides extra capacity.
Detail Display Noise Free Noiseless design for quiet sleep Easy to Assemble Easier assembly saves time Sturdy Material Obtain longer daily life Floor Protection Reduce wear and protect floors
Specifications Color Brown Size Full/Queen Material Engineered Wood Product Dimensions Full 77.5"L x 56.6"W x 37"H Product Dimensions Queen 82"L x 67.5"W x 37.5"H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, no noise when moving around and very sturdy. Looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bed for my husband and I !! It’s good quality very sturdy and goes great with out farmhouse theme

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shocked and Amazed
reviews.reviewText: I have to be honest, I didn't expect much from this bed. The value was just too good but the reviews sucked me in. I'm not a small girl and my worry was that I'd sit on it and it would collapse. Never happened. Had the bed for almost two months and it's going strong. Assembly was quick. My Task Rabbit tasker seem to have put it together in seconds. The bed is a really great quality and I loved the fact that I don't need a box spring. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: it’s really nice, i like the way it looks, a little difficult to put together some bolts where harder to put in, nice quality, main reason i gave it a 4/5 was the sturdiness, it’s holds together well but kinda scary for bigger people. lol😭

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the bed
reviews.reviewText: My daughter and her grandma out the bed together and were able to complete in about an hour. It did not arrive on time, but was three days late. She is happy with the bed and picked it out herself. Overall sturdy bed for a teen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bed looks and feels very high quality. The build of the frame is very strong and sturdy and will provide a perfect frames for anyone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defect and poor way of solving the problem
reviews.reviewText: The worst product I have bought on Amazon. The frame is of metal and it came with such defects that it was impossible to assemble it . The fact is that it was bought for my elderly mom visiting my son in nyc in his new studio and the frame was bought specifically for my mom to make her stay comfortable . It took 3 days of constant negotiations for the seller to agree to make a refund .thank you , Amazon team associates, who joined our chats persuading the seller to make a refund ( the frame is not expensive . But the shipment is almost the price of the frame . The seller insisted first that the defect was small ( though we shared the pictures proving how impossible it is to assemble the frame ), then the seller wanted us to return the bed through ups office ( meaning that we need to bring it first ( heavy metal bed frame ) and plus pay for the return shipment to ups. We were not against returning the defected bed frame but insisted on arranging a pick up for it. Finally the seller agreed to make a total refund (though I do not see the refund on my account yet) without picking up the bed. Naturally, it was initially obvious from the pictures we shared with them that the bed was damaged. We had to waste so much time on communication not mentioning that we had to think of a plan B for my mom where to stay :;(( No gift card or anything like this for the huge inconvenience was offered , though even Amazon associate team, being a witness of the seller’s way of communication and the damaged product, strongly suggested the seller do smth like this. I would never recommend this seller to be on Amazon platform. We are human beings and things happen , but the seller is supposed to solve the problems in a professional and prompt way

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great but makes noise
reviews.reviewText: My fiancé and I have had this bed frame for about a year. At first it was great didn’t make any noise at all but now every time we move the headboard makes a loud screeching sound.
